EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - TaaS - 2014.12.03.Email - Follow Up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Testing in the Cloud with Tosca
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for taking the time to join our webinar “Testing in the Cloud with Tosca”, introducing our new Cloud-Based Test Management Suite, Tosca-as-a-Service (TaaS). We hope you enjoyed the webinar and are also excited about the growing adoption of ‘cloud computing’ solutions. Your active participation and engaging questions helped to make the webinar lively and interesting.
Check out www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts> for the recording of this and other webinars.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Michael Niessl TaaS Product Owner Tricentis
Jessica Chao Product Marketing Specialist Tricentis
